mapper.select: SELECT re.id, re.`name` AS resourceName, re.type AS resourceType, re.url AS resourceUrl, re.permission, re.parent_id AS parentId, re.icon FROM sys_resources re INNER JOIN sys_role_resources rr ON re.id = rr.resources_id INNER JOIN sys_role ro ON ro.id = rr.role_id AND ro.delete_flag = 0 INNER JOIN sys_user_role ur ON ur.role_id = ro.id WHERE re.delete_flag = 0 AND re.`status` = 0 AND re.type = 1 AND ur.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY re.sort ASC

SELECT distinct r.permission FROM sys_resources r INNER JOIN sys_role_resources rr ON rr.resources_id = r.id AND r.delete_flag = 0 AND r.`status` = 0 INNER JOIN sys_user_role ur ON ur.role_id = rr.role_id AND ur.user_id = #{userId}
